path: artifacts/PinkMoon Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.PinkMoon: contracts/PinkMoon Full Smart Contract Security Audit/PinkMoon

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that could lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if there are long excluded addresses lists.
findings.location: includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply functions in the PinkMoon contract
